original_text: By faith Sarah herself received power to conceive, even when she was past the age, since she considered him faithful who had promised.
korean_text: 믿음으로 사라 자신도 나이가 많아 단산하였으나 잉태할 수 있는 힘을 얻었으니 이는 약속하신 이를 미쁘신 줄 알았음이라

sentences.original_text: By faith Sarah herself received power to conceive
sentences.korean_translation: 믿음으로 사라 자신도 잉태하는 능력을 받았으니

sentences.original_text: even when she was past the age
